name: Saving Gal
description:
This is a short adventure about a dog, Gal, which gets lost in a cursed dungeon, Pipo, his friend, will do his best to help him out. 

The player will need to solve calculations - level 6th Primary School (10 - 12 year old students) to follow the correct route until reaching Gal. 

I hope you enjoy at the same time you revise your Maths skills.
